name: ProcareSelect Laser Lens Cleaner, Ideal for CD Player, DVD Player, Optical Disc Drive, Safe and Effective 6 Brush Dry System
short_description: Designed to remove dust or dirt that may cause skipping or reading problems.
Cleans most optical disc player that is CD/DVD compatible.
Six super soft and fine brushes to ensure thorough cleaning without any harm to the sensitive lens.
Easy to use multi language (EN/FR/ES) audio guidance.
Regularly use Procare’s Laser Lens Cleaner to prolong the life of the optical disc player.
product_description: Procare is an industry-leading pioneer in providing total care solutions for all types of consumer electronic products. This Laser Lens Cleaner was created with a goal to provide stylish, safe and smooth cleaning experience. Enjoy! Quick guidance note: - Insert the Laser Lens Cleaning disc into your player with the brush side down. - Press the PLAY button. Listen to the voice instructions and follow the directions to complete the cleaning process. - Dust may accumulate on the brush bristles or on the cleaning disc, it is recommended to brush it off with a fine Microfiber cloth after each use for better lens cleaning experience each time. * Not recommend for use in slot loading disc players as it may damage the fine brush bristles. * This CD Laser Lens Cleaner will be compatible for use on CD/ DVD/ Blu Ray players. Remember to check format compatibility on player specification before use. * Laser lens cleaning is recommended after every 8 hours of use! What's in the box: - Laser Lens Disc Cleaner x 1
product_details: Best Sellers Rank #128 in Audio & Video Lens Cleaners

name: Arsvita CD Laser Lens Cleaner Disc Cleaning Set for CD/VCD/DVD Player, Safe and Effective
short_description: 【Why to Use】Laser Lens Cleaner for CD/VCD/DVD players experiencing slow loading, skipping or freezing of discs during playback.
【Special Technology】The 2-brush clean process removes dirt and dust deposits that cause audio and video dropouts and distortions.
【Usage Effect】Cleaning the laser lens can extend the service life of CD / VCD / DVD player, and improve the sound and image quality at the same time.
【Compatible Players】Works with CD/VCD/DVD player. Not compatible with PS1/2/3/4,Xbox/Xbox 360/Xbox One/Xbox X,Wii/Wii U/Bose player.
【What You will Get】Cleaner disc*1, A piece of glasses cloth*1, User manual*1.
product_details: Best Sellers Rank #1 in Audio & Video Disc Cleaners

name: Nicer CD/VCD/DVD Player Cleaner Kit, Laser Lens Cleaning Disc with Double Brush Cleaning System, NS-2
short_description: 【Why do you need it? 】If your CD DVD or VCD player has been used for a long time and has not been cleaned. Then try to use this kit to clean your device. It will help your player to bring better playback effects.

【What problem can it solve?】The CD/VCD/DVD device is ejected, the playback is stuck, the picture is not clear, and the loading is slow. When these problems occur with your player, it may be that the laser lens on the device is dirty. Using a cleaning kit to clean up can improve these problems and extend the life of the machine.
【Scope of Applicable Equipment】It can be used for CD/VCD/DVD equipment, but does not support PS1/2/3/4, Xbox/Xbox 360/Xbox One/Xbox X, Wii/Wii U/Bose Player.

【Advantage of this Product】Its operation is simple. There are voice guidance, left and right channel testing. The whole procession only takes 3 minutes. The kit is included a microfiber cloth that can be used to clean CD discs.
【What you will get?】CD Cleaning Disc *1. Cleaning Liquid *1. Microfiber Cleaning Cloth *1, Instruction Manual *1. And 6-month after-sales service period. Our team are ready for you at any time.

name: Digital Innovations 60120-00 CleanDr Laser Lens Cleaner
short_description: Laser lens cleaner for CD and DVD players having issues with discs that load slowly, skip, or freeze during playback
Cleaning the laser lens can extend the life of the CD or DVD player, while improving sound and image quality
Exclusive 10-brush Cyclone Clean Process removes dust, dirt, and debris from the laser lens
Safe for CD and DVD players, Computers (CD/DVD), XBOX/XBOX360 and PS1/2 game systems
Not recommend for multi-disc CD/DVD players. Not intended for use with Blu-Ray players, WiiU, XBOX ONE or PS3/PS4
Optimizes CDs, DVDs, and game system performance
Unique 10-brush, three-stage Cyclone Clean Process demagnetizes and removes dust and dirt from the laser lens , ensuring optimal performance
Do not use with Blu-ray or Playstation 3 systems.
product_description: CleanDr is the #1 laser lens cleaner in the US. It lets you safely clean your CD or DVD player. The 10-Brush Cyclone Clean process removes dirt and dust build-up that causes audio and video dropout and distortion. Includes voice instructions available in English, Spanish, and French.
product_details: Best Sellers Rank #150 in Audio & Video Lens Cleaners

name: Maxell DVD-LC DVD Lens Cleaner, One Size
short_description: SUPER FINE MICROFIBER BRUSHES: The Thunder on brush system features ultra-fine synthetic fibers impregnated with copper for maximum cleaning and demagnetization. Ideal for removing scratches.
MAXELL RECOMMENDS: It is recommended to clean the DVD player's lens after every 10 hours of use. When the brush shows signs of wear or after 20 usages, it is recommended to replace the product.

IMPROVING QUALITY: Laser lens cleaners can enhance DVD player quality, fixing issues like slow loading, skipping, and freezing during playback. Cleaning the lens boosts player durability, sound, and image quality.

COMPATIBLE: This product is safe for use with Blu-Ray players, all DVD players, computers (DVD), laptops (DVD), XBOX/XBOX360, and PS1/2 gaming systems, but it is not suitable for use with PS3, PS4, or WiiU.

EASY TO USE: Insert the DVD lens cleaner with graphics facing up and arrow forward. Play the video, press stop to remove it for cleaning only. Carefully take the disc out of the player and return it to its case.
product_description: Product Description The Maxell Model 190059 DVD Lens Cleaner features the thunder on brush system that offers super fine synthetic fibers infused with copper for optimal cleaning and demagnetization, making it ideal for removing scratches. Maxell recommends cleaning your DVD player's lens after every 10 hours of use, and replacing the brush after 20 uses or when it shows signs of wear. This laser lens cleaner improves DVD player quality by addressing issues such as slow loading, skipping, and freezing during playback. It's compatible with Blu-Ray players, all DVD players, computers, laptops, XBOX/XBOX360, and PS1/2 gaming systems, but not with PS3, PS4, or WiiU. From the Manufacturer Features For use in DVD players only Features Thunderon Brush System; equipment set up and enhancement features; ideal for home theaters Includes tests for audio performance, including Dolby 5.1 surround sound Interactive on-screen instructions in 8 languages including system set-up, demonstrations of how to use DVD equipment, frequently asked questions, and movie trailers Model number: DVD-LC

name: Elecom AVD-CKBRP3 Blu-ray DVD CD Lens Cleaner, Wet Type, Relieves Reading Errors, Uses Approx. 40 Times, PS4 Compatible, Made in Japan
short_description: Cleans and wipes away dirt and dust from pickup lens For non-playable devices. This is a wet type "multi-lens cleaner"
Blu-ray Disc player/drive has two reading lenses. This product can both clean two lenses Support CD/DVD player/drive, multi-use
Rescue Brush This brush is designed to clean the lens using several rotations when disk is detected after setting the disc. Creates a trick to read discs with drives that don't recognize discs
The ultra-fine splitting line of synthetic fibers is bonded together with a layer of natural and synthetic fibers to remove dirt without damaging the lens
The cleaning liquid is dripped off the label surface of the disc. The right amount will penetrate the brush on the back so you don't have to worry about liquid splashing out inside the device
Also available for slot-in types
It uses an auto-cleaning method that automatically starts cleaning just by setting the disc
Long lasting durability that can be used approximately 40 times
Comes with live action video to show how cleaning works
product_description: Specifications: ■Cleaning: Eliminate reading errors ■ Cleaner type: Wet type ■Dimensions (diameter): 4.7 inches (120 mm) ■ Set Includes: 2 x wet discs, 1 x cleaning liquid, instruction manual (English language not guaranteed). ■Supported OS: ◆ Supported OS/Windows OS, Mac OS *Please update the disk drive according to the version of each OS. ■ Compatible devices (computer): PC internal drives and external drives, CD drives, DVD drives, Blu-ray Disc drives. ■ Compatible devices (AV devices): AV devices include music players, DVD players, DVD recorders, Blu-ray Disc players, Blu-ray Disc players, Blu-ray Disc recorders (cannot be used with in-car Blu-ray players, Blu-Ray car navigation systems) ■ Compatible devices (game related to): PlayStation(R) PS one(R), PlayStation(R) 2, PlayStation(R) 3, PlayStation(R) 4, Xbox(R), Xbox360(R) ■Compatible Devices Note: ※Depending on the device manufacturer, the use of commercially available lens cleaners may be limited. Please check your device's manual before use. 【Description】 ■ Clean and wipe off dirt and dust from the pickup lens. This wet type "multi-lens cleaner" is suitable for non-renewable devices. ■ There are 2 types of reading lenses for Blu-ray Disc player/drive. This product can clean both of the two lenses Support CD/DVD player/drive, multi-use ■ Rescue Brush This brush is designed to clean the lens using several rotations when disk is detected after setting the disc. Creates a trick to read discs with drives that don't recognize discs. ■ Ultra fine splitting thread of synthetic fibers bonded together in a layer of natural and synthetic fibers to remove dirt without damaging the lens. ■ The cleaning liquid drips from the label surface of the disc. The right amount will penetrate the brush on the back so you don't have to worry about liquid splashing out inside the device. ■ It is also compatible with slot-in types. ■ It uses an auto-cleaning method that automatically starts cleaning just by setting the disc. ■ Long lasting and durable design that can be used approximately 40 times. ■ Comes with a real action video showing how cleaning is worked.
